C. Trading with/on Loyalty Rewarded

Conditions Relating to the Sale of Products to You

This section deals with conditions relating to the sale of products by Loyalty Rewarded affiliate partners to you, where these sales have been enabled by and conducted via the Loyalty Rewarded service.

There will be no direct contract created between the user making the purchase and Loyalty Rewarded. The contract of sale will be between the user and the partner who is selling the product. Each affiliate partner has their own terms and conditions which will be prominently displayed and easily accessible on their own sites and also as part of the order process. However, Loyalty Rewarded takes endeavours to protect the best interests of its users and to ensure they are provided with terms and conditions that comply with industry best practice. While varying by partner, the minimum standards Loyalty Rewarded expects from its partners are as follows:

The contract

When you place an order to purchase a product from a Loyalty Rewarded affiliate partner, the partner will send you an email confirming receipt of your order and containing the details of your order. Your order represents an offer to the partner to purchase a product which is accepted by the partner when it sends email confirmation to you that they have dispatched that product to you. That acceptance will be complete at the time the partner sends that email to you. Any products on the same order, which the partner has not confirmed have been dispatched in such a confirmation email, do not form part of that contract.

Returns

Each partner has their own specific returns policy that can be viewed on their own website and also accessed via the confirmation of purchase sent to the user. In addition to those specific terms, customers in the European Union are entitled to a statutory cooling-off period of seven business days. Details of this statutory right and an explanation of how to exercise it are accessible from the order confirmation email.

Online Shopping

When shopping online via Loyalty Rewarded affiliate partners, you will also be raising money for your chosen charity or other good cause. We have agreements in place with all our affiliate shopping partners that a small percentage of the value of your order will be paid as a commission to Loyalty Rewarded. While these commission rates vary according to the partner, Loyalty Rewarded commits that a portion of that commission will be passed directly to the partner’s nominated charity or foundation.

Payment Schedule

Loyalty Rewarded always seeks to remit money to charities as rapidly as possible. However, no money can or will be paid across to charities until it has been received by Loyalty Rewarded from the partner retailers. This will often include a waiting period to allow of permitted returns period and also for their own internal accounting systems.

Other Payment Terms

In some cases, Loyalty Rewarded depends upon retail partners to track and report sales made to consumers via their partnership with us. We cannot be held responsible if the retailer fails to report a sale to us. All retailers have their own rules upon which they determine transactions to be genuine. For example, an attempt to earn money simply by clicking/registering with no intention to continue to use/buy from their website could be deemed as non-genuine. These rules may or may not be advertised by ourselves or the retailer and may be discretionary.

We will always endeavour to recover non-payments from the retailer, the decisions by ourselves, the retailer or retailers tracking agent is final. Whilst we will try and recover missing commissions, at any point we reserve the right not to chase missing commission payments, particularly where no purchase is made. If missing payments are paid later by the retailer then the appropriate payment will be made to the nominated charity. We will always pay amounts due where money has been received from a retailer and tracked to a consumer’s account provided so long as that account with us remains active, the transactions are deemed by ourselves and the retailers to be genuine and the terms of the payment to the retailer are met.

Loyalty Rewarded reserves the right to reclaim or make appropriate balance adjustments where it has been established that any credit has been applied, or payment made, in error. This will include but is not limited to transactions where the credit is not genuinely due or payment for any credited transaction has not been received from a merchant or its agencies.
